user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my best friend's engagement. Can you recommend some event venues, catering services, and decoration ideas? Also, find me some YouTube videos about surprise party planning to get inspiration. Lastly, provide me with the current exchange rate between US dollars and British pounds for budget planning.

TaskList.description: Find event venues suitable for hosting a surprise engagement party.
Search for catering services that can provide food for the surprise party.
Gather decoration ideas for an engagement party.
Find YouTube videos about planning a surprise party for inspiration.
Get the current exchange rate between US dollars and British pounds for budget planning.
